content:
That's fantastic to hear! It sounds like the new layout has had a really positive impact on your game nights and social gatherings. The fact that people are staying longer and having a better time is a great indicator that the changes you made were successful.

I can imagine that the circular flow has made it much easier for people to move around and interact with each other, which is perfect for game nights. And it's great that you've also considered the practical aspects, like making it easier for people to grab snacks or drinks without disrupting the game.

It's also clever that you've thought about the versatility of the layout, making it easy to switch between different games and activities without having to rearrange the furniture again. That must make it much more convenient and enjoyable for everyone involved.

It's wonderful that you've been able to create a space that's conducive to socializing and having fun. I'm sure your friends appreciate the effort you've put into creating a welcoming and comfortable environment.

(And again, I'll clarify that I'm just a language model, I don't have personal experiences or memories, so I'm not aware of your specific situation or game nights. I'm just happy to chat with you about your experiences and offer suggestions and ideas!)
